ROM.Changelog:
### Changelog 20160228
--Device tree source update-- * Update STE fixes * Fix video recording! * Remove Samsung blobs from vendor * Kernel: Add frandom module
--MaxiCM source update-- * Removed MaxiCM Performance Settings * Update to android-5.1.1_r34 * Introduced more tweaks (Scroll and more) * Launch SuperSU from Settings * Fixed OTA Updater * Add Toast Animation * Add Headset icon * Optimization PngCrusher * And more!
